text: "Achy Breaky Song" is a song by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a parody of "Achy Breaky Heart" by Billy Ray Cyrus. It described how the singer was fed up with listening to the original song and things he would rather do. It was released on the 1993 album Alapalooza. Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:1993 songs
title: Achy Breaky Song
